title: Java Software Engineer
description: Java Developer at Soft Dev AI (Remote, US)About Us: Soft Dev AI is a leading tech company shaping the future of digital solutions. We are seeking a skilled Java Developer to join our remote team across the United States, offering individuals the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects and collaborate with a diverse group of professionals.Position: Java Developer Location: Remote (US) Employment Type: Full-time (Contract or Regular)Responsibilities:Design and develop high-quality Java applicationsCollaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutionsImplement best practices in software development and coding standardsConduct code reviews and troubleshoot issues as neededRequirements:Proficiency in Java programming languageExperience with Java frameworks like Spring, Hibernate, or Apache StrutsKnowledge of web development tools including HTML, CSS, and JavaScriptFamiliarity with database systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or OracleStrong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently in a remote settingExperience:2+ years of experience in Java developmentPrevious work on enterprise applications or backend systemsExposure to RESTful web services and API developmentUnderstanding of object-oriented design principlesWorking Hours:Typical working hours from 9:00 am to 5:00 pm or 10:00 am to 6:00 pmJoin us at Soft Dev AI and become part of an innovative team dedicated to pushing the boundaries of technology. If you are passionate about Java development and eager to tackle exciting challenges, we want to hear from you.Note: We are committed to creating an inclusive and diverse workplace and welcome applications from all qualified individuals.
